transforms.code:
try:
		# Load Analysis Object
		analysisName = "_equipo_mtto_perdidas"
		obj = system.mes.analysis.getMESAnalysisSettings(analysisName)
		# Load analysis Params
		end = self.view.params.endDate #system.date.parse(self.view.params.endDate, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")
		start = self.view.params.startDate #system.date.parse(self.view.params.startDate, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")
		params = {'eqPath':value}
		# Get analysis result Data
		data = system.mes.analysis.executeAnalysis(start, end, obj, params).getDataset()
		if data.rowCount > 0:
			# Convert to list
			list = []
			totalDt = 0.0
			for i in range(data.rowCount):	# col 0 = datetime # col 1 = availability (0-1)	
				totalDt = totalDt + data.getValueAt(i,1)
			accumulated = 0.0
			for i in range(data.rowCount):
				val = data.getValueAt(i,1)
				accumulated = accumulated + val
				perc = 100 * accumulated / totalDt 
				list.append( {'state': data.getValueAt(i,0), 'value': val, 'accumulated': perc} )
			return list
		else:
			return [{'state':"Ninguno", 'value':1, 'accumulated':100 }]
			#return [{'state':"uno", 'value':10, 'accumulated':10 }, {'state':"dos", 'value':5, 'accumulated':15 }, {'state':"tres", 'value':3, 'accumulated':18 }] 
	except:
		return [{'state':"None", 'value':0, 'accumulated':0 }]
